description:
Fans of the Marvel Cinematic Universe are finally having the opportunity to see “Marvel’s First Family” join the MCU. Though the character Reed Richards was previously teased with a variant in Doctor Strange in the Multiverse of Madness, played by John Krasinski, this is our first proper Fantastic Four team set in the MCU. Fans [...]

The post ‘The Fantastic Four: First Steps’ Trailer Released appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: ‘The Fantastic Four: First Steps’ Trailer Released

description:
The Buffy the Vampire Slayer universe is being prepared for a comeback. The fan-favorite television series Buffy the Vampire Slayer, based on the 1992 film of the same name, ran from 1997 to 2003. Now a sequel series to Buffy the Vampire Slayer is nearing a pilot order at Hulu. According to Variety, the new [...]

The post ‘Buffy the Vampire Slayer’ Sequel Series With Sarah Michelle Gellar Returning In The Works At Hulu appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: ‘Buffy the Vampire Slayer’ Sequel Series With Sarah Michelle Gellar Returning In The Works At Hulu
